H0.text: Madame de Pompadour and Madame du Barry were mistresses of which French King. Louis XIV

H1.text: Madame de Pompadour and Madame du Barry were mistresses of which French King. Louis XVI

H2.text: Madame de Pompadour and Madame du Barry were mistresses of which French King. Francis I

H3.text: Madame de Pompadour and Madame du Barry were mistresses of which French King. Luis XV

A4.text: Madame de Pompadour was the mistress of Louis XV.

A5.text: Madame du Barry became the mistress of Louis XV after the death of Madame de Pompadour.
